text_block_list.text:
My body felt leaden… like I'd been dragged out 
of a swimming pool with my clothes on…

Slowly I opened my eyes. I could make out the familiar 
shapes of a classroom in the darkness… and the figure 
of Agnes Tachyon standing before me…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Subject is sweating profusely. Body 
temperature… appears to be rising.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Guinea pig you may be, but your body's febrile response is 
unquestionably human. Which is fine for our purposes, of course…

I looked down. My body was entangled with all manner of 
unfamiliar devices and strange instruments…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ah, this is just like the day we first met…! Only 
this time we have the laboratory all to ourselves. 
Nobody will interfere with my experiment!
choice_data_list: Laboratory…? But this is just an ordinary classroom…!
Laboratory…? But this is just an ordinary classroom…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, not so! I am only here because you agreed 
to take part in this experiment.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
And this space is entirely of YOUR creation… 
so in that sense, it's quite accurate to call 
this our "laboratory", don't you agree?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
A-hahahaa! Then understand this. A guinea pig's job is to be 
subjected to whatever conditions the test requires.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
And you volunteered to be my guinea pig, did you 
not? If you wish to renegotiate the terms of your 
employment, perhaps now is not the best time.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
To probe beyond the limits… to reveal the true potential 
of horsegirls… this requires tireless effort and research, 
of which testing is an indispensable part!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Now! Perhaps it's time I let you try a rather enjoyable new serum 
I have created. It has an intense blue glow which I think you 
will find quite pleasing!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Heeheehee… and with this your muscular strength will increase 
several fold… Your body will be blessed with unimaginable 
strength, strength surpassing the most fearsome monster…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Now… open wide…

There was nothing I could do to stop her. She was right, after 
all. I was the one who volunteered to be her guinea pig.
I gathered my resolve, closed my eyes… and opened my mouth…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Well, well. Good morning my little guinea pig.

The sunlight burned as it flooded my eyes. But 
that must mean everything up to now had been…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmm? You seem troubled. Some kind of… nightmare, perhaps?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Curious… the light level in here hasn't changed, but there is a 
pronounced dilation in your pupils… Intriguing… most intriguing. 
Why don't you tell me what you saw.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
There is still much we do not understand neurologically about the 
dreaming brain… But if we apply the principles of depth 
psychology to your experience…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It seems as though you see me as a horsegirl who 
might at any moment subject you to horrifying experimentation, 
without warning or consent…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I see… that is the Agnes Tachyon that resides in your psyche.
choice_data_list: Sorry I, uh… didn't mean anything by it…
Sorry I, uh… didn't mean anything by it…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha…! To think that I would go to the trouble of ASKING you to 
open your mouth! The Agnes Tachyon of your dreams clearly has 
more time to waste than I do…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
One does not ask the guinea pig's PERMISSION to 
commence the experiment, good gracious no!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hahahaha! Oh, what are you gawping at now? Did you forget that 
you willingly donated your body to my research?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
And I was so close, too. Why, a few moments longer and you would 
have been sleeping like a baby… and I could have slipped serum 
beta down your throat without you even noticing!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes, this. For what it's worth, on this occasion I was 
actually trying to do you a service. I have high hopes for serum 
beta's effectiveness, you see, but it tastes quite revolting…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh well, now that you're awake I won't need to worry about 
spilling these 120ml… Because you can use those precious 
opposable digits of yours to do the job yourself!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: It certainly makes MY life easier… and that's what counts.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Is there a problem, guinea pig? Your tasks are as follows. One: 
receive the serum. Two: Drink the serum. Did I miss anything?
*chattering*

For some time after, I went about my business… trying my best to 
ignore the stares as my thighs glowed blue through my trousers.
